24.movie_plot: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's turned into one huge lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a river-rafting trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

148.movie_plot: A story about the ins and outs of one unusual health facility in the early twentieth century, run by the eccentric Dr. Kellogg.

113.movie_plot: Take two rival television reporters: one handsome, one talented, both male. Add one Producer, female. Mix well, and watch the sparks fly.

131.movie_plot: Zookeepers struggle to deal with the policies of changing directors.

52.movie_plot: A 16-year-old girl visits her gay half-brother and ends up seducing his boyfriend, thus wreaking havoc on all of their lives.

98.movie_plot: With the help of a talking freeway billboard, a wacky weatherman tries to win the heart of an English newspaper reporter, who is struggling to make sense of the strange world of early 1990s Los Angeles.

25.movie_name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail (1974)
25.movie_plot: King Arthur and his knights embark on a low-budget search for the Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

156.movie_plot: A humourous and thought provoking view of what animals in zoos might be thinking about their captivity and surroundings.

19.movie_plot: Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.

93.movie_name: Back to the Future Part II (1989)
93.movie_plot: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

51.movie_plot: A tale of nineteenth-century New York high society in which a young lawyer falls in love with a woman separated from her husband, while he is engaged to the woman's cousin.

3.movie_plot: An old Jewish woman and her African-American chauffeur in the American South have a relationship that grows and improves over the years.

127.movie_plot: A colorful array of characters compete at a national dog show.

95.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

21.movie_plot: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.

134.movie_plot: A bureaucrat, in a retro-future world, tries to correct an administrative error, and becomes an enemy of the state.

108.movie_plot: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon works with a nuclear physicist to solve a murder and prevent a terrorist act against the Vatican during one of the significant events within the church.

124.movie_plot: A senior chef lives with his three grown daughters; the middle one finds her future plans affected by unexpected events and the life changes of the other household members.

146.movie_plot: After his mistress runs over a young teen, a Wall Street hotshot sees his life unravel in the spotlight and attracting the interest of a down and out reporter.

54.movie_plot: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band The Doors and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

101.movie_plot: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

159.movie_plot: After a tragedy, John Ingram and his wife Rae are spending some time isolated at sea, when they come across a stranger who has abandoned a sinking ship.

32.movie_plot: A psychiatrist must cure a young patient that presents himself as Don Juan, the greatest lover in the world.

89.movie_plot: A local Pennsylvania band scores a one hit wonder in 1964 and rides the star-making machinery as long as they can, with lots of help from its manager.

71.movie_plot: Two vicious step-siblings of an elite Manhattan prep school make a wager: to deflower the new headmaster's daughter before the start of term.

116.movie_plot: An African-American man is hired to find a woman, and gets mixed up in a murderous political scandal.
